sentences.sContent: We firmly believe that women themselves will be a luminescent solar heating.
sentences.sContent_eng: We firmly believe that women themselves will be a luminescent solar heating.
sentences.sCn: 我们坚信，女人自己就是一个会发光发热的太阳。

sentences.sContent: A hydromedusa spreads its luminescent tentacles in the Weddell Sea near Antarctica.
sentences.sContent_eng: A hydromedusa spreads its luminescent tentacles in the Weddell Sea near Antarctica.
sentences.sCn: 在南极边的威德尔海，一只水螅水母伸展它的冷光触须。

sentences.sContent: This paper discussed the emendation of the luminescent spectra of semiconductor films.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper discussed the emendation of the luminescent spectra of semiconductor films.
sentences.sCn: 讨论了半导体发光薄膜的光致发光谱修正要点。
